amendment.description: To provide adequate funding for the Drug Courts program.

action.text: Amendment SA 3227, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3227 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3227 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S12712; text: CR S12712) To provide adequate funding for the Drug Courts program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3227 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3227 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
